00052 class Filter
00053 {
00054 public:
00055 
00068         MultiTrack &do_filter_MultiTrack(MultiTrack &inWave);
00069 
00080         Track &do_filter_Track(Track &inWave);
00081 
00092         SoundSample *do_filter_SoundSample(SoundSample *inWave);
00093 
00105         virtual m_sample_type do_filter(m_sample_type x_t) = 0;
00106 
00112         virtual void reset(void) = 0;
00113 
00159         template<class ElemType> class hist_queue
00160         {
00161         public:
00162 
00168                 hist_queue(long len)
00169                 {
00170                         length = len;
00171                         front_idx = back_idx = 0;
00172                         if((array = new ElemType[length]) == NULL)
00173                         {
00174                                 cerr << "Couldn't create array for Filter queue of length " << length << endl;
00175                                 exit(0);
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178 
00182                 ~hist_queue()
00183                 {
00184                         delete [] array;
00185                 }
00186 
00192                 ElemType dequeue(void)
00193                 {
00194                         int old_back_idx;
00195 
00196                         old_back_idx = back_idx;
00197                         back_idx = (back_idx + 1) % length;
00198                         return array[old_back_idx];
00199                 }
00200 
00206                 void enqueue(ElemType new_val)
00207                 {
00208                         array[front_idx] = new_val;
00209                         front_idx = (front_idx + 1) % length;
00210                 }
00211 
00218                 ElemType index_from_oldest(long i)
00219                 {
00220                         long idx;
00221 
00222                         // we know idx%length, find the idx in the right range though
00223                         idx = back_idx+i;
00224                         while(idx>=length)
00225                                 idx-=length;
00226 
00227                         // return the index
00228                         return array[idx];
00229                 }
00230 
00237                 ElemType index_from_newest(long i)
00238                 {
00239                         long idx;
00240 
00241                         // we know idx%length, find the idx in the right range though
00242                         idx = front_idx-i;
00243                         while(idx<0)
00244                                 idx+=length;
00245 
00246                         // return the index
00247                         return array[idx];
00248                 }
00249 
00250         private:
00251 
00255                 long length;
00256 
00260                 long front_idx;
00261 
00265                 long back_idx;
00266 
00270                 ElemType *array;
00271         };
00272 
00273 };
